thread.section_title: Insight Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Insight Loans | insightloans.com
thread.title: customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: Not the easiest re-fi I've ever done, but it was handled really well and we closed less than 3 weeks after we started the process. Some of that was because of the massive amount of documentation that we had to provide, but that's normal these days even if you have excellent (800+ FICO) credit. Why not 4 stars? We kept getting bogus notices from the bank, our loan person would tell us to ignore them (and we did) it was still annoying to get notices saying that we've have to come up with thousands out of pocket at closing when we ended up getting over a thousand back at closing.
